Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SESSION_PROPS_INS_ID_SP" ( P_SESSION_ID IN NUMBER, P_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_VALUE IN VARCHAR2, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1, P_ID OUT NUMBER ) IS BEGIN SELECT CMN_SESSION_PROPERTIES_S1.NEXTVAL INTO P_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SESSION_PROPERTIES ( ID, SESSION_ID, NAME, VALUE, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( P_ID, P_SESSION_ID, P_NAME, P_VALUE, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY ); END;
